storyInfo: The pioneers who accepted injections begin to pass out one by one. A strange noise is heard from inside the laboratory, and a never-before-seen enormous geometric construct appears. The experiment is now completely out of control.

attributes.content: How long has it been since you were last here, Director Saria?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Going a little spacey?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: That's not like you... Thinking about the test site?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Do you remember Haydn 1 laboratory?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Of course I do. That's where Ifrit's from, right? We even investigated that place together.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I've been to several hundred similar ruins since.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: It's very risky to work with the military. Rhine Lab hides behind layers of contracts and conducts these dangerous experiments with other laboratories doing the dirty work.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: But this time, Ferdinand chose to charge into the fray himself.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: That tells us Rhine is one careless move away from turning into one of those ruins.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: If he fails... Ferdinand will end up buried under the ruins too, right? His real cause of death won't even hit the papers.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Ferdinand has no way out of this anymore. He has no choice but to make sure this experiment succeeds.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Nngh...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Are you worried about Silence and the gang?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I'm only analyzing the risks.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Huh, I thought you were more honest than that.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Okay, okay. She'll be fine. She's a lot stronger now than she used to be, just to look out for Iffy.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Are you consoling me, Director Muelsyse?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: That's unnecessary.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I've never doubted Silence's and Ptilopsis's abilities. They will assume their own responsibilities, and so will we.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.options: We will work with each other.;I believe in our operators.;You

attributes.content: Did I ever mention that I've always really admired the way Rhodes Island works?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: My, you really have a way with words. Makes me want to jump ship and hop over.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Right, right? You feel the same.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I knew I wasn't mistaken.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Multiple power armor signals approaching.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Doctor, the Liberi merc is catching up to us.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Perhaps she's been waiting nearby.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, are you sure Kirsten is here?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Saria's right. Ferdinand can't take this failure, but we don't have time for trial and error, do we?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Rhine Lab headquarters.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: So that's the place that checks the most boxes, huh?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: After I lost contact with Kirsten, I went to her home, the test sites, and all her favorite spots...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Everyone who works at Rhine knows Control doesn't like to hang around the office.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Every day, a bunch of staff members ask where she is, but who knew that she could be right there under our noses?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Scan complete.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Doctor, it's just as you thought. There is a large group of armed militants guarding all exits on all floors.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Rhine HQ must already be under Ferdinand's control.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: We need to make our moves carefully, and I'm including both Muelsyse and myself.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Seize them.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Dammit...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: What are you blanking for?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: All units, we've got a situation at the labs' entrance. It's a Pioneer and a Rhine researcher... Mrgh!
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: In the end, we still gotta hurt people.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: That's self defense. I'll testify for you.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: There's an emergency exit to the left. Run that way! We'll talk after we make it outâ€”
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Someone's coming!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Get ready!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Wait, you again?!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: M-Miss Elena...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: I didn't hurt you, did I?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I'm fine. I figured you'd strike, so I braced myself.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: All of you, stay right where you are.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You're...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Mary Banner of the Trimounts City Police Department.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: We're taking a kidnapping and assault suspect into custody. I'd appreciate your cooperation.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Suspect?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Mary...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You're a hard one to catch. Isn't that right, 'Team Leader?'
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Drop your weapons and put your hands up.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Right hand too.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Put your right hand up, please.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: A syringe?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Hold on, what are you trying to do?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: This is a physical examination.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: There might be a hazardous material leakage in these laboratories. Regulations demand we execute prevention procedures on all personnel.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: May I take a look at the medicine you're administering?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The situation is critical. Please don't get in the way.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Warning: Procedure does not match existing records.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: What you are doing is completely against the rules...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Rules? I don't need a researcher who was... kicked out of Rhine to teach me about rules.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What about me, then?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Do I have the right to ask you to turn this syringe over?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Director Franks...
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: I am the overseer of Site 359. State your objectives immediately.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Sorry, Director Franks, but Director Clooney has taken over responsibility for all your site's functions.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Without his orders, you can't ask us about our operation.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: If I recall correctly, only Control can change an experiment's overseer.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: What gives Ferdinand the right to overstep his bounds?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I can't answer that.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: This should be enough...
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Mission complete. All units, pull out.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: They're gone...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Affirmative. The Defense Section personnel are quickly evacuating the site.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I thought they were here to take the Pioneers away... Am I mistaken about Ferdinand?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ferdinand!
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Ugh...!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Dr. Silence, all Pioneers who received injections have lost consciousness.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Tend to them immediately!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Director Franks, do you know how to administer emergency treatment... Director Franks?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ma'am, I thought we were here to save Mr. Sonny...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Don't think you can change my mind with a couple of sentimental words!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You got my letter...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Trying to win my sympathy only works once, Romano.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I'm just glad I didn't let you get away. Otherwise, who knows what kind of surprises I'd have waiting for me?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You don't trust me...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Why should I?!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Four years ago, you didn't want to go to the quarantine zone. I trusted you, and helped you lay lowâ€”
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Then how did you turn around and thank me?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I was outta my mind! My Oripathy plus my insurance premiums drove me nuts. I had no other...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You broke into my place and forced me to give you everything worth half a dimeâ€”Just for your goddamned insurance premium! You thought they'd let you back into your law firm if you paid it!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You know how much that scared Nana? Did you know she's been bedridden ever since? Remember how she doted on you, even more than she did for her own granddaughter?!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: And how about this? After you got spooked and ran off, I was so worried the cops would find you, do you know what I went through to cover it all up for you?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You don't know anything.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You're a cold-blooded, selfish criminal. I should never have been so soft on you...
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Officer!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: It doesn't matter what kind of bad blood you two have with each other. We need to get out of here, otherwiseâ€”
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: He kidnapped you, and you're making his case for him?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Listen to me. The real problem is with Rhine Lab...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: This shaking...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Uh... Is that coming from inside?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Dorothy's lab...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Run!!!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: It... actually happened...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Such intense tremors... occurring across a large area... Is it a Catastrophe?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: No, not a Catastrophe. It's the lab...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: In the center of the laboratory cluster, a fissure appears on what should have been an exceedingly sturdy building.
It wasn't caused by the tremors.
The building is being torn apart from its deepest parts.
Something is breaking out of its shell, bit by bit, and unbelievably quickly.
In just an instant, half its floors are engulfed.
Above the rubble, the silver object starts bringing the entire site into its embrace.
The newly-born, colossal object gracefully twists its geometric figure and coldly stares down at the people on the ground.
None of this is beyond her comprehension.
She understands the principles behind all this, and she's calculated all the possibilities.
Yet she still forgets to breathe and blink, and she forgets all about the trembling earth beneath her feet and the roaring gusts all around.
Her dream has evolved from a blueprint and a word of promise to a reality.
How beautiful...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: But also terrifying.
Get downâ€”
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You were in tremendous danger... If you were just one inch closer, you would've been crushed by the bricks!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It's too late...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: What is?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Doctor, you failed to stop me. My experiment... succeeded.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Director Clooney! What's happening at the laboratoriesâ€”
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: You are frightened.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Frightened...? Haha, of course not. I'm just overwhelmed with emotion at these results! I... I'm truly happy for you and Director Franks.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Your teeth are chattering.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Ha... haha...
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Perfect.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Fearing such great unknowns is an instinct of the weak.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You're right. Before your results, our enemies... the Columbia's enemies will tremble in fear!
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: You're talking about terrorizing our enemies?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: That's what the army men worry about all day and night. They give me the funding, and I give them the weaponsâ€”We scratch each other's backs, and that's where it ends.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: But you did remind me...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: It's time to move to the next phase.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Wouldn't that provoke it...? What about the people at the site?
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: They're making the greatest sacrifice of all.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Remember their names.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: As pioneers in the truest sense, their names will go down in history.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Their fearlessness gave birth to this ferocious beast, and we will take control of it and make it ours. It will be our hands and eyes.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Just as our ancestors, the brave settlers, brought burdenbeasts under their control, enabling civilization to conquer the wilderness.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: We, too, will conquer this beast created by technology and expand mankind's reach into even greater unknowns.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: â€”We will be the trailblazers who expand the frontiers of civilization.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Are... are these the silver monsters? How did they grow so big...?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: We'll need something special to do any damage!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You goddamnedâ€”monster!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Did you see those arrows?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: The three arrows, all shot at different times, approach the silver geometric figure in a tidy row. The farther they fly, the slower they get, all the way down to an immeasurable crawl.
Yet they remain suspended in the air.
Enveloped by the silver light, they disappear from sight at the very same moment.
So the monster's got some magic tricks?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: It disintegrated them.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: But it seems awfully quiet to me...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Watch out! Move!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Urgh... Was that an energy beam, or some crossbow bolts? Where did it come from...? It was so quick, I couldn't catch it.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Logic can't explain its movements and attack patterns.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Perhaps... to that thing, moving and attacking are one and the same...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Supposing this really is the... final product of Dorothy's experiment, then the whole site is within its range of perception.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: If the idea crosses its mind, it could modify the physical properties of all objects within that range, instantaneously.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Or, in plain Victorian, we're like modeling clay for a kid to play with, is that right?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: More or less.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: We need to stop attacking it, Officer. Otherwise, it'll level the whole site within minutes!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Wait, you wouldn't happen to...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I wouldn't happen to have a bunch of explosive-equipped drones, would I?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Keep dreaming!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: So what about those people from Rhine Lab...? Are they here to help us deal with the experiment?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Do you remember what I just said?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You about it leveling the whole site?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: It's already begun...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Am I seeing things? Did that crane... turn into a perfect sphere?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: It won't be long before it hits the quarters, too!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Dammit! If this site goes down... Trimounts... not to mention the other cities are still in the dark.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: They don't even know a monster made by some stupid frickin' eggheads is about to roll them up into a ball!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: We need to get out of here right now.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Get the word out...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: We need to get the word about this out. He's known for a long time it would come to this.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Who? Who's behind all this? Who'd take it this far? Dorothy Franks?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: No, it's not her.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: â€”It's a man who's made a fool for a long time now. Someone who's really taken me for a ride.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: He wants to erase the Pioneers... and everything that's happened here at the site.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: And all of Rhine Lab might be on his side.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: The police were probably bought off, too.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I'd bet good money there's no media outlet ready to report on this.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Miss Elena, you know who we should get word out to.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I'll find Dr. Silence. This is the most crucial objective of our operation.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: But you'll be trapped here... Your lives might even be in danger!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I trust Dr. {@nickname}, and you too.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: I know we can do this.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: You trust me...?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: What can I do...?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: The observation station... I have to get to observation.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Need a ride?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: The transport over there...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I borrowed it from Rhine.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: It so happens I need to go back and nab the real bad guy behind all this. You're going the same way, aren't you?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Mind if I tag along?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: No matter which way we slice this... Officer, I'm a suspect in your custody...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Mary doesn't answer, but she extends her hand to Sonny nonetheless.
Beside her, Elena does the same.
Sonny takes their hands and climbs onto the transport, its engine already running.
The three of themâ€”a police officer, a Pioneer, and a researcherâ€”speed toward the edge of the site together.
The sandstorm behind them gives chase in vain, unable to stop their escape.
